about_the_game:
PARRY KING" is a voxel boss rush parry game in which a crowned king is relentlessly mastering the path of parry.

Game Features

  • No exploration elements!
  • No death penalty!
  • No items to consume!
  • Super fast retries!

Compared to many other high difficulty action games, you will experience a higher concentration and emphasis on "learning enemy behavior patterns and learning how to respond".

Tips #1: Parry as the enemy attacks!

Enemies will attack you in rhythm.
Press the button at the right moment to parry their attacks!

Tips #2: Cut! Cut! Cut!

After parrying all enemy attacks, it is the player's turn.
Just hit the attack button repeatedly to inflict damage on the enemy.

Tips #3: Avoid dangerous attacks!

Enemies also launch attacks that are impossible to parry.
Avoid them brilliantly and strike counterattacks.

Tips #4: Attack, attack, and keep attacking!

The enemy's Trunk Gauge accumulates when you parry an enemy's attack or attack an enemy.
Build up the gauge to the maximum and strike the " finishing blow".

name: PARRY KING

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel i5+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 5500 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: An action game to master the parry. No search, no death penalty, and a boss rush to train your skills!
